name: Festival of Ice

Let's begin this year's ice fishing competition."/pause 200/faceDirection Lewis 3/pause 300/faceDirection Lewis 2/faceDirection Lewis 1/pause 300/faceDirection Lewis 2/pause 400/speak Lewis "Contestants, your goal is to catch as many fish as you possibly can in two minutes using the provided fishing rods.#$b#You must catch your fish here, from these holes in the ice."/pause 600/speak Lewis "Well, is everyone ready?"/pause 500/waitForOtherPlayers startContest/jump Lewis/faceDirection Pam 2 true/faceDirection Elliott 1 true/faceDirection Willy 2 true/speak Lewis "Begin!"/advancedMove Lewis false 0 -4 2 1000/advancedMove Marnie true 4 6000 -2 0 4 5000 2 0/advancedMove Maru true 3 4000 0 2 3 7000 0 -2/advancedMove Jas true 2 0 0 -9 -4 0 2 20000 4 0 0 9 -2 0 3 15000/advancedMove Jodi true 1 6000 -1 0 0 2 1 8000 0 -1 1 6000 0 -1 1 0/jump Willy/shake Pam 700/showFrame Pam 16/extendSourceRect Pam 0 32/showFrame Elliott 40/extendSourceRect Elliott 16 0/shake Elliott 400/pause 300/showFrame Willy 16/extendSourceRect Willy 0 32/playMusic fallFest/playerControl iceFishing
afterIceFishing: pause 100/playSound whistle/waitForOtherPlayers endContest/pause 1000/restoreStashedItem/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/extendSourceRect Pam reset/extendSourceRect Willy reset/extendSourceRect Elliott reset/specificTemporarySprite iceFishingCatch/faceDirection Pam 0/faceDirection Willy 0/faceDirection Elliott 0/playMusic event1/warpFarmers 71 35 0 72 35 0 70 35 0 69 35 0 73 35 0 71 36 0 70 36 0 72 36 0 69 36 0 73 36 0 left 73 37 0/pause 1000/viewport 71 35 true/pause 2000/move Lewis 0 4 2/speak Lewis "Wow, that's a lot of fish!$h"/pause 300/showFrame Lewis 18/shake Lewis 1000/speak Lewis "*gag*... the smell...$s"/pause 500/showFrame Lewis 0/pause 600/move Lewis 0 1 2/speak Lewis "Now, for the winner of this year's ice fishing competition..."/pause 800/playMusic none/pause 3000/cutscene iceFishingWinner/null/playMusic event1/pause 500/fork DickWin/move Lewis 0 1 2/speak Lewis "Here's your prize! Enjoy."/awardFestivalPrize/null/move Lewis 0 -1 0/speak Lewis "Well, that's it for this year's Festival of Ice. Thanks for coming, everyone! #$b#Now let's release these poor fish...$s"/move Lewis -3 0 0/move Lewis 0 -1 0/advancedMove Willy true 0 3 -2 0/pause 600/viewport move 1 0 5000/pause 2000/playMusic none/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/cutscene iceFishingWinnerMP/fork OtherPlayerWin/message "I can't believe I won! Thanks for coming, everyone!#$b#Now let's release these poor fish...$s"/move Lewis -2 0 0/pause 600/viewport move 1 0 5000/pause 2000/playMusic none/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "I didn't win the competition, but it was still fun! Time to head home."/waitForOtherPlayers festivalEnd/end
Penny_spouse: Are you entering the fishing contest this year, @? My mom's pretty serious about winning.
Haley_spouse: Brr... my hands are freezing from making this snowman.$l
Sebastian_spouse: Don't worry about me, I never get cold...
Sam_spouse: Aren't you cold? Are you sure you don't want my jacket?
Alex_spouse: I'll be rooting for you in the fishing competition.
Harvey_spouse: I'm dreaming of our warm fire back home...$l
Elliott_spouse: I know you'll beat me in the fishing competition, but I don't mind. I'm just here for the fun of it.$h
Abigail: What do you think of my snow-goon?
Robin: I'm sorry, but carving ice parapets requires my undivided attention!
Demetrius: You know what? I probably should've worn a jacket.
Maru: I'm not very creative when it comes to snowmen.$s
Sebastian: Cold? Nah, I never get cold.
Pierre: This snow is so cold I can't feel my fingers anymore...$s
Shane: If it was up to me, I'd probably have a pizza festival at the saloon, instead...
Caroline: How's winter coming along for you, @?$h
Linus: Igloo-building's an art I picked up from the tundra dwellers who live beyond the frozen sea.#$e#That was many years ago.$h#$e#An Igloo makes a nice home, but it's easier to just stay in my tent year-round.
Alex: Snowmen are okay, I guess. But mostly I'm looking forward to the spring.
George: Hmmph... Wife dragged me out into the cold for this?
Evelyn: Did I ever tell you how George and I first met? He actually pelted me with a snowball in this very festival.#$e#He was a gentleman back then, and came over to see if I was okay.$h
Lewis: Welcome to the Festival of Ice!#$e#The highlight of today's festival is the ice fishing competition. We set up this 'frozen lake' and stocked it full of fish.#$b#Just let me know when you're ready to compete.
Clint: Emily started helping me without any provocation... does that mean something? *gulp*$4
Emily: Wow, this snowman needs a makeover. Who made this?$s
Penny: $y 'Hmm... What kind of snowman should we make?_A classic one. Carrot nose, top-hat, scarf._I guess maybe it's best to stick with the classics, huh?$h_Something funky. Icicle antennas, pine cone eyes._Okay! That sounds like fun.$h_Snowmen are boring. Think outside of the box!_Um, okay... I think I might stick with something more conventional.'
Pam: I plan on winning the ice fishing competition!#$e#Willy is gonna be pretty hard to beat, though... He does this kinda stuff day and night.$s
Haley: I guess Winter isn't all bad... playing in the snow can be fun!
Jodi: The forest looks beautiful in the winter, doesn't it?
Sam: Hey, @. Are you gonna enter the ice fishing competition?#$e#Oh, not me. I don't know how to fish.
Leah: Oh, ice. A beautiful material to sculpt in, but so impermanent.#$e#But I guess that might make the art even better.
Marnie: I feel bad for all the poor, cold animals out there.$s
Elliott: I'm entering the ice fishing competition today. Why not?#$e#It's rare that Willy ever loses, though.
Gus: Sorry there's no food.#$e#Just wait until the Feast of the Winter Star. You'll be stuffed for days.
Willy: $y 'Hey, @. Ready for some ice fishing?_Yes. I'll do my best!_That's the spirit!$h_Yes, and I'm going to beat you!_We'll see.$h_To be honest, no. I'm bad at fishing._Well, then think of it as good practice!$h'
Wizard: Sneaking off to visit my weird tower? You're odd for a mundane.
Harvey: Extreme temperatures can put your body under a lot of stress, so make sure to bundle up!#$e#Oh, and enjoy the festival!$h
Sandy: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?$h#$e#I kind of miss the rain, actually...$s
Jas: I wanna give him a carrot nose!$h
Vincent: I saw a big fish down there!
Leo: You could make an igloo twice as warm if you stuffed feathers in the walls!

Abigail_spouse_y2: Imagine if we lived in an igloo together!$h#$e#It would be fun, but I'm happy living anywhere with you.$l
Leah_spouse_y2: Someday, I should teach you how to sculpt with ice! It would be fun!$h#$e#I'd be very curious to see what you'd come up with.
Maru_spouse_y2: You'll do great out there, honey! Just stay calm and focused.
Penny_spouse_y2: When we get home, let's make a fire and have some hot cocoa.$0#$e#...with marshmallows?$h
Haley_spouse_y2: Come here, let me fix your hair... I'm going to take an action shot of you during the contest!
Emily_spouse_y2: Ta da! It's you!#$e#What? You don't see the resemblance? I think it's perfect!
Sebastian_spouse_y2: Hey, you really need to win the contest today.$0#$e#Uh... well, I guess I made a little bet with Marlon...$1
Sam_spouse_y2: You should teach me how to use a fishing rod sometime. I think I'd be good at it.
Alex_spouse_y2: Hey! You're going to win by a longshot today, I know it. Make us proud!
Harvey_spouse_y2: Hi, honey. Good luck today in the ice fishing contest.$0
Elliott_spouse_y2: I've been practicing my fishing technique. I won't hold back against you, my dear.$1
Shane_spouse_y2: Remember when we sat at the old pond and shared a beer? That was around here somewhere.#$e#Well, it's best not to dwell in the past... even the good memories bring me pain.
Abigail_y2: Have you ever thrown a bunch of pebbles on a frozen lake? It makes a very nice sound.#$e#...Don't tell my dad, but I'm wearing the Winter Star sweater under this coat.
Robin_y2: Ice sculpting is a rewarding challenge for me. It's a distinct material that I'm not used to!
Demetrius_y2: Water ice... a most profound substance, indeed. Necessary for life, it makes a fitting material for statuary meant to represent the living form.
Maru_y2: The key to making a well-crafted snowman begins with ensuring a level foundation and avoiding excessive weight on the upper section.$3
Sebastian_y2: You ever notice how quiet it is in the snow?
Linus_y2: Ahh... The forest has entered her long slumber for the winter...$1
Pierre_y2: Our family has matching Winter Star sweaters.#$e#Now, if only Abigail would wear hers...$2
Caroline_y2: Hi, @. Are you finding any time to relax from your farming duties this winter?$0
Alex_y2: You think anyone would mind if I took a dip in the frozen lake after the festival?#$e#I've heard ice baths are good for the muscles.
George_y2: When you get old and bald like me, you need a good, warm hat.
Evelyn_y2: You never know... this could be the last time I ever make a snowman with Alex.#$e#Life is short, dear. Make sure to treasure every moment.
Lewis_y2: Hello, @. It's that time of the year again for the ice fishing festival.#$b#Speak with me when you're ready to start the competition!$1
Clint_y2: These lumps of snow won't form into balls...$0#$e#I think I'm better working in the heat than in the cold.$2
Penny_y2: I'm too nervous to walk on the frozen lake...#$e#I read a book once, where a girl fell through the ice.#$b#She was okay! But... I've been cautious about it ever since.
Pam_y2: $y 'I lost last year because I chose a bad spot. I have a good feeling things will be different this time around._I don't think the location matters._Hah. Says you! I'll prove you wrong._I'll beat you anyway._...$4_Well, good luck._Same to you, kid.'
Emily_y2: A snowman has to look the part! Isn't the top hat and scarf stylish?
Haley_y2: I'm glad I wore earmuffs, it's freezing out here!$0#$e#I brought my camera this year. It's perfect lighting for a winter photoshoot!
Jodi_y2: Gatherings like this are a good way to build community with our neighbors.#$e#It's nice how cold weather seems to bring people together.
Kent_y2: You ready for the contest? We all think you're going to win.
Marlon_y2: This time of year isn't so bad. No bugs during winter...#$e#Think you can beat Willy this year? He's a tough competitor...
Sam_y2: Hey, why are you laughing? He's not even done yet!#$e#You just wait... once we're finished, he'll be one fine snowman.
Leah_y2: You have to temper ice before cutting it, otherwise you can't shape it!
Shane_y2: Winter can be really hard on animals. Did you install heaters in your coops and barns?
Marnie_y2: Aww... That piggy looks adorable all bundled up!$1
Elliott_y2: Look here, it's my secret weapon... a flask of fine spirits, to wet my lips a moment before the whistle sounds...
Gus_y2: I've been spending too much time holed up inside, watching Gridball... it's good to get outside in the crisp winter air.
Wizard_y2: Hmm? How did you get here?#$e#Pay no attention to me. I'm simply observing...
Harvey_y2: I shouldn't have waxed my moustache this morning, it's frozen solid! Oh dear...$2#$e#Well, if you need an ice pick, you know where to find me...$h
Jas_y2: Don't the fish get cold under there?$3
Vincent_y2: My big brother is helping me build a snowman!$0
Willy_y2: Aye, the whole town'll be watchin' our little tournament today. Let's give them all a good show.
Leo_y2: *crunch* *crunch* Snow makes a funny noise when you step on it!$1
